channel.title: Contact Request / update request
channel.description:
I'm interested in this mod: https://ficsit.app/mod/3TvrZ85YkpxoAe
The mod maker left no contact information. Does anyone know how to contact them directly so I can see if they intend to update the mod?

item.title: Contact Request / update request
item.dc:creator: @kithylin Kithylin
item.description:
@kithylin wrote:

If a moderator finds this: PLEASE DELETE THIS. THERE IS NO WAY TO FLAG THINGS??? WE CAN’T DELETE OUR OWN POSTS? WTF?

Read full topic
